data.text: N mɔn yi n yɛɛn nakeli, n fe toon ti alo xiye, n kɛdin mafilinxin to kore.
Malekan yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “I nanse toma?” N yi a yabi, n naxa, “N kɛdin nan toma kore, a kuya nɔngɔnna yɛ mɔxɔɲɛ, a yigbo nɔngɔnna yɛ fu.”

Nayi, a yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “Dangan nan na ra naxan xuyama ayi yamanan birin yi. A sɛbɛxi kɛdin fɔxɔ kedenna ma fa fala muɲadene birin kedima nɛn yamanani. A mɔn sɛbɛxi fɔxɔ kedenna boden ma fa fala naxanye birin e kɔlɔma wuleni, ne fan kedima nɛn.

Alatala Sɛnbɛn Birin Kanna falan ni ito ra: ‘N dangani ito rafama nɛn, a yi so muɲadene birin ma banxine yi e nun muxun naxanye birin e kɔlɔma wuleni n xinli. A luma nɛn e banxine kui alogo a xa e nun a xalanbene nun a gɛmɛne birin kala.’ ”
Malekan naxan yi falan tima n xa, na yi a maso, a a fala n xa, a naxa, “I yɛɛn nakeli, i a mato naxan minin be iki.”
N yi a maxɔdin, n naxa, “Nanse a ra?” A yi n yabi, a naxa, “Liga se debedin nan famatɔ a ra.” A mɔn yi a fala, a naxa, “Na nan toma yamanan muxun birin yi.”
E yi debedin dɛ raganla yɔxɔ daxini te, n yi ɲaxanla nde to dɔxi a kui.
Malekan yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “Fe ɲaxin misaala nan ɲaxanli ito ra.” Na xanbi ra, a mɔn yi ɲaxanla madɛtɛn debedin kui, a yi a dɛraganla dɛtɛn a dɛ ra.
N yi n yɛɛn nakeli, n yi fe toon ti alo xiyena, n yi ɲaxalan firin to tuganɲɛ. Foyen yi e gabutɛne yi alo yaya xɔnla gabutɛne. E yi debedin tongo, e te a ra kore.
Malekan naxan yi falan tima n xa, n yi na maxɔdin, n naxa, “E debedin xalima minɛn?”
A yi a fala n xa, a naxa, “E sa banxin nan tima a xa Babilɔn yamanani. Banxin na raɲan, debedin dɔxɔma nɛn mɛnni, e yi a batu.”
